response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $12,000 to me due to its unique features, craftsmanship, and the time invested in its development. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers to you, I kindly propose a price of $9,500 for this product. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between valuing my investment and providing you with an opportunity to acquire something truly special at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 9500}
